programme.title: Dire Strayts
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E08, Doug and Carrie invite Ray and Debra Barone to dinner; Doug gets stuck in an opening leading up to the attic.

programme.title: I, Candy

programme.title: Roamin' Holiday
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E10, Doug invites Spence to move in as part of a plan to keep Carrie's annoying friends from spending a weekend.

programme.title: Sparing Carrie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E11, Doug's bowling-team sponsor demands victory, meaning Doug may have to fire his team's weak link: his wife, Carrie.

programme.title: Net Prophets
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E12, Carrie insists on using Doug's Christmas bonus to invest in Internet stock.

programme.title: Party Favor
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E13, Carrie helps Doug plan a bachelor party after she volunteers him to be the friendless Danny's best man.

programme.title: Block Buster
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E14, Doug's memories of his glory days as a football player don't match those of his old teammates.

programme.title: Frozen Pop
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E15, Arthur disrupts Carrie and Doug's lives by moving from the cold basement to the much warmer second floor.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E16, Doug is distraught when he learns that Carrie has been cheating at board games.

programme.title: Meet By-Product
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E17, Carrie and Doug reminisce about how they first met, remembering that it certainly wasn't love at first sight.

programme.title: The Shmenkmans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E18, Doug and Carrie search for new friends, who do not have children; Arthur rediscovers a breakfast cereal from his childhood.

programme.title: Surprise Artie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E19, Doug tries to keep Arthur busy while Carrie sets up a surprise party for his 75th birthday.

programme.title: Wild Cards
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E20, Doug loses all his money when he goes to Atlantic City with Deacon; Arthur threatens to injure Carrie's boss.

programme.title: Big Dougie
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E21, Big Brother Doug tries anything to impress his new protege, including entering a 10K run.

programme.title: Soft Touch
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E22, Doug is duped by Tim into participating in a pyramid scheme that requires him to sell water filters.

programme.title: Restaurant Row
programme.desc: King of Queens, S02E23, Carrie bars Doug from eating at his favorite Italian restaurant, but he goes back for lunch and bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Do Rico

programme.title: Roast Chicken
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E02, When Doug's boss sees what a comedian he is, he asks him to "roast" him at his banquet. However, Doug finds that he is not as funny as he first thought.

programme.title: Fatty McButterpants
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E03, When Doug learns that Carrie is buying him clothing from the "Big and Tall Shop", he is determined to lose weight.

programme.title: Class Struggle
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E04, When Carrie spends a night out with some of her colleagues, she finds out that they are more successful then she is.

programme.title: Strike One
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E05, While Doug's company is in strict negotiations, he decides to buy a brand new SUV.

programme.title: Strike Too
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E06, It is week two of the IPS strike, and Doug still has not gotten a job. To get back on his feet, his sister Stephanie get him a substitute teacher job at her school.

programme.title: Strike Out
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E07, Carrie and Kelly plan a get-together for Doug, Deacon and Arthur to keep them from going crazy during the strike.

programme.title: Dark Meet
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E08, Doug, Carrie and Arthur are thinking about the first Thanksgiving they (and Arthur's second wife Lily) spent together.

programme.title: Twisted Sitters
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E09, Doug and Carrie have to watch Deacon and Kelly's kids while they are out of town. When one of the kids sees them having sex, they have to find a way to keep him from saying anything.

programme.title: Work Related
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E10, When Arthur goes to Carrie's work he is offered a job there, which really begins to irritate her. Doug competes to be Mr. May for IPS but Deacon is in the way of him getting it.

programme.title: Better Camera
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E11, Doug buys Carrie a camera for christmas, but her office gives her a better one. Lou Ferigno moves in next door.

programme.title: Wedding Presence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E12, Doug and Carrie try to go to a wedding but not have to stay.

programme.title: Hi-Def Jam
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E13, Doug convinces his sister to go out with Carrie's boss so that he can go to his house to watch the Super Bowl on his high-def TV.

programme.title: Paint Misbehavin'
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E14, Doug makes Carrie tell him people she knows that she finds attractive, and she says Deacon. Deacon is having a birthday party at a paintball course and it turns into a war.

programme.title: Deacon Blues
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E15, Doug sees Deacon with another woman while he told Kelly he had to work late.

programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.desc: Cheers, S05E24, Woody's parents want him to move back home, but the regulars try to keep him.

programme.desc: Cheers, S05E26, With Sam and Diane's wedding day approaching, big questions still loom.

programme.title: Pudd'nhead Boyd
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E09, Woody finds a new admirer when he portrays Mark Twain as an understudy.

programme.title: A Kiss Is Still A Kiss
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E10, Sam encourages Rebecca to tell her boss she has a crush on him.

programme.title: My Fair Clavin
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E11, Cliff gives his girl a makeover and ends up losing her to every other guy.

programme.title: Christmas Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S06E12, Sam buys a last minute Christmas gift for Rebecca from another shopper.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Flight Status
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Flight Status, S03E03, The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: Interface
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Interface, S03E10, The Ionisphere, where the Earth interfaces with space, is little understood, it effects radio communications, GPS signals and satellites alike.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Gravity, S03E09, LISA pathfinder, has led the way for a space based gravity wave detector, what are gravity waves and why are they so hard to detect?

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: The Planet Makers
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Planet Makers, S01E05, From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: The Beginning of the End, Apollo Gets Complicated & The End of Apollo
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E11, The Beginning of the End - After the first Moon landing the Apollo science program was about to start in earnest but people were losing interest. Apollo Gets Complicated - New technology is added that extends the reach of the Apollo program.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Murder Most Fowl

programme.title: Dischord
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E36, At the Paris Opera House, an infatuated stagehand takes on the murderous role of the villain.

programme.title: All Brawn, No Brains
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E41, Looking to make a quick buck, two crooked trainers kidnap and kill their wealthy client. And though he survives to tell the tale, police dismiss his outrageous story.

programme.title: A Cruel Twist of Fate
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S02E03, Los Angeles. August 19, 2007, a gunman approached a backyard party and fired into the crowd. Two people ended up dead, they were brother and sister. July 22, 2011, father of three, Julian Jimenez Castaneda was murdered on his way home from his new job.

programme.title: Gold Chain
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S02E08, Miami. May 15, 2009, Keanthony Evans was riding his bicycle when ambushed by two armed males from whom he could not flee. May 2, 2010, 20-year-old Rashad Charles was killed after playing a game of dice. Crime Stoppers looks at the case of Antonio Tovar.

programme.title: Beloved Brother
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S02E13, Cleveland. November 26, 2009, Moussa Salti was working at his market when thieves entered the store, one with a gun. August 31, 2010, Lamar Lewis' 35th birthday and also, tragically, his last day alive. He was killed by someone in the car he was in.

programme.title: Cases In Miami Beach
programme.desc: Crime Stoppers: Case Files, S03E03, Miami. January 13, 2002, Jason Norris was killed at a gas station. June 10, 2010, Vincent Mckoy was killed by a random bullet. November 14, 2010, Michael Beatty II was targeted outside a corner store. May 15, 2009, Keanthony Evans was ambushed and killed.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S01E06, Casino surveillance leads Detective Rod Demery to an unexpected killer.

programme.desc: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space, S01E05, On Draconia, the Doctor reveals the Master's plan to provoke war to the Draconian Emperor. But the Master escapes, taking Jo as a hostage.

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Frontier in Space, S01E06, The Doctor leads a mission to the Ogron home world to apprehend the Master and rescue Jo. But the Master is in league with some old enemies of the Doctor.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E01, Injured by an Orgron gun, the Doctor asks the Time Lords to send the TARDIS after the Daleks. Leaving him asleep, Jo goes to explore the planet Spirodon.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E02, The Doctor recovers from his coma and befriends a Thal expedition but is captured by the Daleks and taken to their base. Then a second Thal expedition arrives with terrible news.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E03, In Dalek city, the Doctor breaks out of his prison cell and joins forces with the Thals. With the Daleks in pursuit, the Doctor is forced to improvise a daring escape plan.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E04, The Doctor and the Thals escape from the Dalek city and the Doctor is delighted to find that Jo is alive. The Daleks are preparing a deadly bacteria to kill all life on the planet.

programme.title: Part 5
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E05, Desperate to prevent the Daleks from releasing their plague, the Doctor, Jo and the Thals infiltrate the Dalek base. But the Daleks detect the intruders!

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Planet of the Daleks, S01E06, A force of ten thousand Daleks are coming to life below the surface of Spiridon. The Doctor and the Thals must find a way to defeat the Daleks before they invade the galaxy.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E01, In Wales, a dead miner is found glowing green. UNIT investigates and Jo empathizes with the environmentalism of Cliff Jones who is opposing the pollution from Global Chemicals.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E02, Investigating the old mine workings, Jo and the miner, Bert, become trapped beneath the surface when the lift is sabotaged. Bert touches some green slime and becomes infected.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E03, The Doctor and Jo discover the mine’s terrible secret. Global Chemicals’ managing director, Stevens is determined that they won’t live to reveal what they have learnt.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E04, The Brigadier attempts to seal the giant maggots in the mine with explosives, but this only results in the creatures burrowing to the surface.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E09, On a summer night in 1987, a 17-year-old girl to come home is found raped and strangled near the Hudson River. And In 1983, a young mother is raped and murdered at work. The crime remains unsolved for two decades.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: The Touch of Satan
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan, S09E08, An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.
MST3K: The Sinister Urge, 19941105000000 +0000, Two laid back detectives crack down on an underground porn ring while Frank threatens to blow up Deep 13.
MST3K: Track Of The Moon Beast, 19990613000000 +0000, In Track of the Moon Beast (1976), a mineralogist is hit by a meteor which causes him to transform into a lizard-monster.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

MST3K: Women Of The Prehistoric Planet, 19900220000000 +0000, Our intrepid hosts are trapped between Isaac Asimov's Literary Doomsday Device and Robert Ito from Quincy M.E. (1976) in a fur caveman outfit.

MST3K: Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell, 19960217000000 +0000, A hero on a quest to gather magical stones battles an evil sorcerer and learns the benefits of a potato diet in Deathstalker and the Warriors from Hell (1988). Tom and Crow put on a Renaissance Fair for Mike and Crow reads a trashy romance novel
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes, S01E05, In the theater, Joel and the Bots get the third installment of "Radar Men from the Moon" before the Bela Lugosi film "The Corpse Vanishes".

Love, Again, 20150621000000 +0000, A couple, on the brink of divorce must work together to plan their daughter's wedding. While they don't want to disrupt their daughter's happiness by announcing their divorce, they must learn to work together.
Royal Hearts, 20180101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Montana rancher Hank learns he's the last heir of the late King of Merania.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.

A Smile as Big as the Moon, 20120129000000 +0000, A special-education teacher is determined to make sure his students get a chance to attend space camp. Overcoming unbelievable odds, he achieves amazing results. Stars John Corbett and Jessy Schram.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

programme.title: A Perfect Match
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie considers John's adventurous job offer.

programme.title: A Perfect Match, Part 2
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie reaches a decision about her future.

programme.title: A Budding Romance
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E01, Hallmark Original Series. The whole town anxiously awaits the impending blooming of the Middleton.

programme.title: Without Magic for a Spell
programme.desc: Good Witch, S03E02, Hallmark Original Series. The Middleton Merriwick is still not in bloom.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E10, The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E11, O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Echoes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E12, Teyla begins to see apparitions of ancients in distress and believes they are the ghosts of the Ancients recently massacred by the Replicators. McKay believes he's found the whale that saved him a year ago while trapped in a submerged puddle jumper.

programme.title: Irresponsible
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E13, The team hear of a great warrior with stories of defeating both the Genii and Wraith and seek him out in hopes of making a new ally. But when they learn this great warrior is none other than Lucius they believe he's up to his old tricks again.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: A Matter Of Time
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E16, A black hole swallows the SG-10 team, and O'Neill is sent on a rescue mission. As the hole's pull grows stronger, it draws the Stargate toward it and soon threatens to destroy Earth. Will O'Neill find a way to stop this super-destructive force?

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E17, Jackson's body is swapped with that of an old Goa'uld enemy. As Jackson lies dying in the alien's ancient body, O'Neill and Teal'c accidentally switch forms too, and unless the alien is captured, all will be trapped in their new bodies forever!

programme.title: Serpent's Song
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E18, SG-1's arch-enemy Apophis is dying and seeks sanctuary with O'Neill. But what he really wants is a new host in exchange for his knowledge of the Goa'uld. Will O'Neill grant his request or send him back to the Goa'uld to face his fate?

programme.title: One False Step
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E19, On a routine recon mission, the SG-1 team discovers a new, friendly life form. But the encounter turns deadly for the new race because of a virus SG-1 inadvertently introduces. Can SG-1 develop a vaccine before this plague eradicates a civilization?

programme.title: Show And Tell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E20, A boy mysteriously appears at SGC and pleas for help, claiming the Goa'uld are chasing him to find a race of invisible beings. But the SG-1 team doesn't know that the invisible aliens plan to destroy humanity…and their invasion has already begun!

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.title: Into The Fire
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E01, Hathor captures O'Neill and implants him with a destructive Goa'uld symbiote that could eventually kill him. Meanwhile, O'Neill's rescue party is defeated by Hathor's invincible energy barrier and time is running out. Is there a way to save O'Neill?

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E002, Brandon's new girlfriend has intimacy issues and Brenda has trouble at school.

programme.title: The Little Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E003, Brenda arrives back in Beverly Hills in the middle of the night and Steve's scheming ways almost backfire as the gang decides which classes to take.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

programme.title: Moving Targets
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E007, Andrea takes initiative in her relationship with Dan. David and Kelly take sides in a fight between their parents.

programme.title: Twenty Years Ago Today
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E008, Brenda's relationship with Stuart causes a stir at the Walsh's twentieth-anniversary party. Brandon catches Dylan off guard with unexpected results.

programme.title: Otherwise Engaged
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E009, Brenda and Stuart argue about the details of their marriage. Lucinda has unsettling news for Brandon.

programme.title: And I Did It...My Way
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E010, The gang follows Brenda and Stuart to Las Vegas in hopes of stopping the wedding.

programme.title: Take Back the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E011, Laura threatens to label Steve as a date rapist at a campus rally. He loses Celeste when he confesses his indiscretion.

programme.title: Radar Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E012, Brandon takes an unexpected road trip and Dylan accepts a Thanksgiving dinner invitation at the Walsh's after declining an invitation from Kelly.

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E013, Brandon encourages Emily to pursue her dreams and Steve is caught stealing.

programme.title: Windstruck
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E014, Donna and David celebrate their first year together. Dylan and Kelly get back together, while Andrea falls in love with a new boyfriend.

programme.title: Somewhere in the World It's Christmas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E015, The Walshes trip to Hawai'i doesn't go as planned when their plane is turned around due to technical problems.

programme.title: Crunch Time
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E016, Steve has trouble at the fraternity house and David relies on drugs to keep himself awake through finals week.

programme.title: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E017, Kelly asks David if he is using drugs and Andrea gets surprising news from the doctor's office.

programme.title: Heartbreaker

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E09, Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E10, Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E11, Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E12, A mysterious, unseen creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find the creature. Meanwhile, Inside Sports Magazine wants a lifeguard for their swimsuit issue. Neely and Caroline compete for the cover.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E13, Logan must help his friend Carmen raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back in town just in time to help. Mitch finds himself in a deadly race for justice during his vacation in Baja, Mexico.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E14, Stephanie, Caroline, and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70's television as they try and catch an escaped psychopath bent on killing lifeguards.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E15, CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who then tells the Baywatch team that he's in town with Randy Savage to try and prevent the closure of the Venice Boys' Youth Center. Hogan must take on Ric Flair in a cage match to prevent the closure.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E16, Mitch is convinced by Stephanie's boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing. Things go horribly wrong when Mitch's parachute fails to deploy! Back on the beach, CJ's lifeguarding duties are impeded when she begins dating a celebrity.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E19, The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit. Logan becomes obsessed with competing in a surfing competition. To avoid a curse, CJ and Stephanie must return a sacred lava rock to its original location.
